title: Bug 117981: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view
description:
Description: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label in library file.
2. Select the label item in library outline view.
3.
OB: When trying to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, the focus jumps to the library file node instead of allowing selection of the intended item.
EB: Expectation: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, the item should be selected without any focusing issues.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a library file with multiple items.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select any item in the outline view for the first time.
4. Observe that the focus unexpectedly jumps to the library file node instead of allowing selection of the intended item.
